sentences.english: China has been no exception to the world-wide celebrity of Susan Boyle.
sentences.chinese: 世界名人苏姗波义耳对中国也不例外。

sentences.english: She absences to once fool entire human, even the brocade lotus is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 她要骗过所有的人，就连锦莲也不例外。

sentences.english: The exception wasDeng.There are two explanations.
sentences.chinese: 而邓是个例外，这里有两个解释。

sentences.english: The lack of exotic states tells against a picture of resonances as being composite.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏例外态也不支持共振态是复合的图象。

sentences.english: Mercury is an exception to the rule that metals are solid at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 水银是金属在室温内为固体这条规则的例外。

sentences.english: Everyone wants to play for their country and I'm no different.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都想为他们的国家而战，我亦不例外。

sentences.english: High oxygenic pressure vessels worked as the environmental control and ecological protection has no exception.
sentences.chinese: 作为环控生保系统的高压氧容器也不例外。

sentences.english: Branch out of exception handler block.
sentences.chinese: 从例外处理常式区块分支出来。

sentences.english: My one big exception is my hiking and backpacking gear.
sentences.chinese: 我的一个最大的例外是我的徒步旅行背包装备。

sentences.english: We are creatures of habit, and our sleep is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 我们是具有习惯的生物，我们的睡眠也不例外。

sentences.english: All of the boys, without exception, were cross-examined.
sentences.chinese: 所有的男孩子无一例外地都受到盘问。

sentences.english: Everybody must observe the law not excepting the president.
sentences.chinese: 人人须守法，总统亦无例外。

sentences.english: An exception was Egypt, where receipts shot up by 14%.
sentences.chinese: 埃及一个例外，其进款猛增了14%。

sentences.english: Under all strives for to expedite the market competition to be very intense, constructs the ceramic profession not to be exceptional.
sentences.chinese: 全求化催生下市场竞争十分激烈，建陶行业也不例外。

sentences.english: Gets the offset within the method body, in bytes, of this exception-handling clause.
sentences.chinese: 取得这个例外处理子句的主体长度，以位元组为单位。

sentences.english: Often it's the rule and not the exception.
sentences.chinese: 通常这无一例外的成了一条不成文的规则。

definition: in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
always (previously)/a period of time in the recent past
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
